mapper.sql: config_name , gmt_modified , gmt_create , content , send_channels , interval_seconds , ack_code_timeout_seconds , ack_code_max_validate , id , send_start_time , send_end_time , max_try_count , retry_interval_seconds , sms_out_need_unique_id
mapper.update: update gtc_sms_config set config_name=#{configName}, gmt_modified=now(), content=#{content}, send_channels=#{sendChannels}, interval_seconds=#{intervalSeconds}, ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS=#{ackCodeTimeoutSeconds}, ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE=#{ackCodeMaxValidate}, send_start_time=#{sendStartTime}, send_end_time=#{sendEndTime}, max_try_count=#{maxTryCount}, retry_interval_seconds=#{retryIntervalSeconds} where (id = #{id})
mapper.select: select id, config_name, gmt_modified, gmt_create, content, send_channels, interval_seconds, ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS, ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE, send_start_time, send_end_time, max_try_count, retry_interval_seconds, sms_out_need_unique_id from gtc_sms_config where (id = #{id})

select id, config_name, gmt_modified, gmt_create, content, send_channels, interval_seconds, ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS, ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE, send_start_time, send_end_time, max_try_count, retry_interval_seconds, sms_out_need_unique_id from gtc_sms_config where (config_name = #{configName})

select id,config_name, gmt_modified, gmt_create, content, send_channels, interval_seconds,ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE,send_start_time,send_end_time,max_try_count,retry_interval_seconds,sms_out_need_unique_id from gtc_sms_config and id=#{id} and content like '%' || #activityName# || '%' and config_name=#{configName} and send_channels like CONCAT( '%', #{sendChannel}, '%' ) and gmt_modified>=to_date(#{gmtModifiedBegin},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and gmt_modified<=to_date(#{gmtModifiedEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') order by gmt_create desc

select id, config_name, gmt_modified, gmt_create, content, send_channels, interval_seconds, ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS, ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE, send_start_time, send_end_time, max_try_count, retry_interval_seconds, sms_out_need_unique_id from gtc_sms_config

select id,config_name, gmt_modified, gmt_create, content, send_channels, interval_seconds,ACK_CODE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,ACK_CODE_MAX_VALIDATE,send_start_time,send_end_time,max_try_count,retry_interval_seconds,sms_out_need_unique_id from gtc_sms_config where gmt_modified >= #{gmtModified}
mapper.update: update gtc_sms_config set send_channels =#{sendChannels} , gmt_modified=now() where id in #{item}

update gtc_sms_config set content=#{content}, send_channels=#{sendChannels}, interval_seconds=#{intervalSeconds}, ack_code_timeout_seconds=#{ackCodeTimeoutSeconds}, ack_code_max_validate=#{ackCodeMaxValidate}, send_start_time=#{sendStartTime}, send_end_time=#{sendEndTime}, max_try_count=#{maxTryCount}, retry_interval_seconds=#{retryIntervalSeconds}, sms_out_need_unique_id=#{smsOutNeedUniqueId}, gmt_modified=now() where (id = #{id})
